resources.string: Shake to ON or OFF the flash Light

Read and share more than 150 Subhashitha translations on your android phone. Hamsanaada android app provides an interactive and elegant way to read Sanskrit Subhashitaâ€™s translations to Kannada.
Hamsanaada,  is a collection of  Subhashithas translated to Kannada by Hamsanandi. Saaranga Media in collaboration with Akruti Books Pvt Ltd. published this collection as a printed book in 2011. Hamsanaada android application consists of all the Subhashithas and presents it in a intuitive manner which enriches your reading experience.

Hamsanaada app supports both ASCII and Unicode encodings. This means you can read kannada text even in those android phones which does not support unicode natively or do not have kannada fonts.

This applications provides a number of features which makes reading and sharing the Subhashithas a delight. Some of them are :

Read Subhashithas flipping through your favorite categories
Mark the Subhashitha you like as favorite and it will be copied to the favorites folder
Share your favorite Subhashitha on Facebook or Twitter with a click of a  button

Hamsanaada android application is developed by Saaranga Infotech LLP.

If you like this app please appreciate the effort by rating on Google play and encourage us with your comments.

Saaranga Infotech LLP is a little start-up software company based in Bengaluru.

Saaranga Infotech LLP, with promoters having expertise in the domain for close to a decade, helps SMEs, Non-profits to build a strong presence on the web coupled with rich mobile and social media tools. Saaranga Infotech LLP has been primarily focusing on open source technologies and  the platform the team has developed serves numerous non-profits and SMEs globally with hosted services based on open source applications. The company is well-known for its work on technology for Indian languages, the latest additions to this profile being mobile apps (Android) in Kannada, one of the Indian languages.
